Name: Voodoo I Do
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Pineapple, tequila, orange and apricot with a touch of sour lime all presented in a harmonious Tiki-style concoction.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2011 by Michael Layer at the Chapel Bar in Berlin, Germany.
